Package helper

Class appointmentDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.appointmentDB
  • public class appointmentDB
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles getting the appointments from the database, deleting them, creating them, as well as modifying them

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      appointmentDB()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void createAppointment​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String desc, java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end, java.lang.String contact, java.lang.String custId, java.lang.String userId)
      This function takes in all the user inputted data passed to it and queries the database to INSERT the data as well as handling the timezone conversions.
      static void deleteAppointment​(int appointmentId)
      This functions takes in the appointment id then queries the database in order to delete the specified appointment
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      This function queries the database and retrieves all the elements of an appointment, then creates a new appointment object and adds it to a list until the table is exhausted
      static java.lang.String getContactFromID​(int id)
      This function returns the Contact_Name from the database when given that contacts ID
      static int getCustID​(Customer selectedCustomer)
      This function takes in a selected customer object and gets its ID number in order to make the SQL queries easier

      This function takes in the data from the user selected appointment so the user may change some of the data then it queries the database in order to update the table with the new information.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
        This function queries the database and retrieves all the elements of an appointment, then creates a new appointment object and adds it to a list until the table is exhausted
        Returns:
        an observableList of the appointments from the database

      • createAppointment

        public static void createAppointment​(java.lang.String title,
                                     java.lang.String location,
                                     java.lang.String type,
                                     java.lang.String desc,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                     java.lang.String contact,
                                     java.lang.String custId,
                                     java.lang.String userId)
        This function takes in all the user inputted data passed to it and queries the database to INSERT the data as well as handling the timezone conversions.
        Parameters:
        start - The start date of the appointment
        end - The end date of the appointment
        title - The title of the appointment
        location - The location of the appointment
        type - The type of appointment created
        desc - The description of the appointment
        contact - The contact person for the appointment
        userId - The userID for the appointment

      • deleteAppointment

        public static void deleteAppointment​(int appointmentId)
        This functions takes in the appointment id then queries the database in order to delete the specified appointment
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - The appointment ID of the user selected appointment

      • modifyAppointment

        public static void modifyAppointment​(Appointment appointment,
                                     int appointmentId,
                                     java.lang.String title,
                                     java.lang.String location,
                                     java.lang.String type,
                                     java.lang.String description,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                     java.lang.String custId,
                                     java.lang.String userId)
        This function takes in the data from the user selected appointment so the user may change some of the data then it queries the database in order to update the table with the new information. It also handles timezone conversions.
        Parameters:
        appointment - The selected appointment
        appointmentId - The appointment id of the selected appointment
        title - The title of the appointment
        location - The location of the appointment
        type - The type of appointment created
        description - The description of the appointment
        start - The start date of the appointment
        end - The end date of the appointment
        custId - The customer ID for the appointment
        userId - The user ID for the appointment

      • getContactFromID

        public static java.lang.String getContactFromID​(int id)
        This function returns the Contact_Name from the database when given that contacts ID
        Parameters:
        id - The ID number of the contact
        Returns:
        contact The name of the contact

      • getCustID

        public static int getCustID​(Customer selectedCustomer)
        This function takes in a selected customer object and gets its ID number in order to make the SQL queries easier
        Parameters:
        selectedCustomer - The customer whoms ID needs to be found
        Returns:
        custId The selected customers ID number
